Symbol.Script_1D:
! iOpeningMethod OPENMETHOD_OPEN_SIMP = 1 OPENMETHOD_OPEN_DOUB = 2 OPENMETHOD_PIVOT = 3 OPENMETHOD_SLIDE_INT = 4 OPENMETHOD_SLIDE_EXT_SIMP = 5 OPENMETHOD_SLIDE_EXT_DOUB = 6 OPENMETHOD_POCKET_SIMP = 7 OPENMETHOD_POCKET_DOUB = 8 OPENMETHOD_SLIDFOLD_SIMP = 9 OPENMETHOD_SLIDFOLD_BIFOLD = 10
! iMullionStyle: MULLION_NONE = 1 MULLION_HVGRID = 2 MULLION_EDITABLEGRID = 3 MULLION_CUSTOM = 4 MULLION_PRAIRIE = 5 MULLION_DIVIDED = 6 MULLION_SUNBURST_1 = 7 MULLION_SUNBURST_2 = 8 MULLION_SUNBURST_3 = 9 MULLION_SUNBURST_4 = 10 MULLION_SUNBURST_5 = 11 MULLION_SUNBURST_6 = 12 MULLION_SOLID_GLAZED = 13 MULLION_DIVIDED_FRAME = 14 MULLION_SOLID_PANEL = 15 MULLION_VENT_PANEL = 16 MULLION_FRENCH_PANEL = 17
! gs_SidelightTransomRelation_m: SIDELIGHT_UNDER_TRANSOM = 1 SIDELIGHT_OVER_TRANSOM = 2 SIDELIGHT_CROSSES_TRANSOM = 3
Symbol.Script_UI:
_bGarageDoor = (gs_sectgar | gs_garage | gs_highspeedgar)
! ----- Bottom Part Material Visibility (only High Speed Garage) -----
bShowBottomPartSurface = 0 if gs_highspeedgar then bShowBottomPartSurface = 1 endif
! ----- Leaf Material 2 Visibility -----
if _bGarageDoor then bShowLeafSurface2 = 0
if iDoorPanelType = 1 | iDoorPanelType = 2 | iDoorPanelType = 3 |\ iDoorPanelType = 4 | iDoorPanelType = 5 then
bShowLeafSurface2 = 1 endif else hideLeafSurface2_1 = not(iDoorPanelType = 2 | iDoorPanelType = 3 |\ iDoorPanelType = 4 | iDoorPanelType = 8 |\ iDoorPanelType = 9 | iDoorPanelType = 10 |\ iDoorPanelType = 11 | iDoorPanelType = 13 |\ iDoorPanelType = 16 | iDoorPanelType = 17 |\ iDoorPanelType = 18 | iDoorPanelType = 19 |\ iDoorPanelType = 22 | iDoorPanelType = 23 |\ iDoorPanelType = 24 | iDoorPanelType = 25 |\ iDoorPanelType = 26 | iDoorPanelType = 27 |\ iDoorPanelType = 28 | iDoorPanelType = 76 |\ iDoorPanelType = 77)
hideLeafSurface2_2 = not(iDoorPanelType2 = 2 | iDoorPanelType2 = 3 |\ iDoorPanelType2 = 4 | iDoorPanelType2 = 8 |\ iDoorPanelType2 = 9 | iDoorPanelType2 = 10 |\ iDoorPanelType2 = 11 | iDoorPanelType2 = 13 |\ iDoorPanelType2 = 16 | iDoorPanelType2 = 17 |\ iDoorPanelType2 = 18 | iDoorPanelType2 = 19 |\ iDoorPanelType2 = 22 | iDoorPanelType2 = 23 |\ iDoorPanelType2 = 24 | iDoorPanelType2 = 25 |\ iDoorPanelType2 = 26 | iDoorPanelType2 = 27 |\ iDoorPanelType2 = 28 | iDoorPanelType2 = 76 |\ iDoorPanelType2 = 77) | not(bAsymmetricLeafs)
if hideLeafSurface2_1 & hideLeafSurface2_2 then bShowLeafSurface2 = 0 else bShowLeafSurface2 = 1 endif endif
! ----- Leaf Material 3 Visibility -----
hideLeafSurface3_1 = not(iDoorPanelType = 2 | iDoorPanelType = 8 |\ iDoorPanelType = 9 | iDoorPanelType = 10 |\ iDoorPanelType = 11 | iDoorPanelType = 28 |\ iDoorPanelType = 76 | iDoorPanelType = 77)
hideLeafSurface3_2 = not(iDoorPanelType2 = 2 | iDoorPanelType2 = 8 |\ iDoorPanelType2 = 9 | iDoorPanelType2 = 10 |\ iDoorPanelType2 = 11 | iDoorPanelType2 = 28 |\ iDoorPanelType2 = 76 | iDoorPanelType2 = 77) | not(bAsymmetricLeafs)
if (hideLeafSurface3_1 & hideLeafSurface3_2) | _bGarageDoor then bShowLeafSurface3 = 0 else bShowLeafSurface3 = 1 endif
! ----- Sidelight and Transom Surface Visibility -----
bShowTransomSurfaces = 0 if (gs_door_transom & gs_optype_m_02 > 1 & iMullionStyle_02 <> 15 & iMullionStyle_02 <> 4) | \ (gs_door_transom & gs_sidelight_right & gs_SidelightTransomRelation_m = SIDELIGHT_CROSSES_TRANSOM & gs_optype_m_06 > 1 & iMullionStyle_06 <> 15 & iMullionStyle_06 <> 4) | \ (gs_door_transom & gs_sidelight_left & gs_SidelightTransomRelation_m = SIDELIGHT_CROSSES_TRANSOM & gs_optype_m_10 > 1 & iMullionStyle_10 <> 15 & iMullionStyle_10 <> 4) then
bShowTransomSurfaces = 1 endif
bShowSidelightSurfaces1 = 0 if (gs_sidelight_right & gs_optype_m_05 > 1 & iMullionStyle_05 <> 15 & iMullionStyle_05 <> 4) | \ (gs_sidelight_right & gs_bSidelight_fr_hdiv_right & gs_optype_m_07 > 1 & iMullionStyle_07 <> 15 & iMullionStyle_07 <> 4) then
bShowSidelightSurfaces1 = 1 endif
bShowSidelightSurfaces2 = 0 if (gs_sidelight_left & gs_optype_m_09 > 1 & iMullionStyle_09 <> 15 & iMullionStyle_09 <> 4) | \ (gs_sidelight_left & gs_bSidelight_fr_hdiv_left & gs_optype_m_11 > 1 & iMullionStyle_11 <> 15 & iMullionStyle_11 <> 4) then
bShowSidelightSurfaces2 = 1 endif
! ----- Grids Material Visibility -----
bShowMullionsSurfaces = 0
if (iDoorPanelType = 47 | iDoorPanelType = 48 | iDoorPanelType = 45) |\ (iMullionStyle_05 > 1 | iMullionStyle_09 > 1 | iMullionStyle_02 > 1 | iMullionStyle_06 > 1 | iMullionStyle_10 > 1) then bShowMullionsSurfaces = 1 endif
! ----- Handle Material Visibility ----- if NOT(bAsymmetricLeafs) then if (gs_handle_type_m = 9 |\ gs_handle_type_m = 12 |\ gs_handle_type_m = 13 |\ gs_handle_type_m = 14 |\ gs_handle_type_m = 15 |\ gs_handle_type_m = 23 |\ gs_handle_type_m = 24) then
bShowHandleAccSurface = 1 else bShowHandleAccSurface = 0 endif
if gs_handle_type_m = 0 then bShowHandleSurface = 0 else bShowHandleSurface = 1 endif else if gs_handle_type_m = 9 |\ gs_handle_type_m = 12 |\ gs_handle_type_m = 13 |\ gs_handle_type_m = 14 |\ gs_handle_type_m = 15 |\ gs_handle_type_m = 23 |\ gs_handle_type_m = 24 |\ gs_handle_type2_m = 9 |\ gs_handle_type2_m = 12 |\ gs_handle_type2_m = 13 |\ gs_handle_type2_m = 14 |\ gs_handle_type2_m = 15 |\ gs_handle_type2_m = 23 |\ gs_handle_type2_m = 24 then
bShowHandleAccSurface = 1 else bShowHandleAccSurface = 0 endif
if gs_handle_type_m = 0 and gs_handle_type2_m = 0 then bShowHandleSurface = 0 else bShowHandleSurface = 1 endif endif
! ----- Glass Material Visibility ----- if _bGarageDoor then bShowGlassSurface = 0
if (gs_highspeedgar & gs_bGlazedDoor) |\ (gs_garage & (iDoorPanelType = 5 | iDoorPanelType = 14)) then bShowGlassSurface = 1 endif else if (iDoorPanelType = 0 |\ iDoorPanelType = 1 |\ iDoorPanelType = 5 |\ iDoorPanelType = 6 |\ iDoorPanelType = 7 |\ iDoorPanelType = 8 |\ iDoorPanelType = 9 |\ iDoorPanelType = 10 |\ iDoorPanelType = 11 |\ iDoorPanelType = 12 |\ iDoorPanelType = 28 |\ iDoorPanelType = 41 |\ iDoorPanelType = 42 |\ iDoorPanelType = 43 |\ iDoorPanelType = 44 |\ iDoorPanelType = 49 |\ iDoorPanelType = 57 |\ iDoorPanelType = 58 |\ iDoorPanelType = 59 |\ iDoorPanelType = 60 |\ iDoorPanelType = 69 |\ iDoorPanelType = 73 |\ iDoorPanelType = 74 ) & not(gs_door_transom) & not(gs_sidelight_left) & not(gs_sidelight_right) then bShowGlassSurface = 0 else bShowGlassSurface = 1 endif endif bShowGlass3DPen = bShowGlassSurface
bShowFrameSurfaces = 1 bShowSolidPanelSurfaces = 0 bShowLouversSurfaces = 0 bShowLockSurface = 0
if NOT(bMetalDoor) & NOT(bEntranceDoor) & NOT(_bGarageDoor) & (iOpeningMethod <> OPENMETHOD_SLIDE_EXT_SIMP) & (iOpeningMethod <> OPENMETHOD_SLIDE_EXT_DOUB) then if gs_sidelight_left | gs_sidelight_right | gs_door_transom then
if (gs_sidelight_left & (iMullionStyle_09 = MULLION_SOLID_PANEL)) | \ (gs_sidelight_right & (iMullionStyle_05 = MULLION_SOLID_PANEL)) | \ (gs_door_transom & (iMullionStyle_02 = MULLION_SOLID_PANEL)) | \ (gs_sidelight_left & gs_bSidelight_fr_hdiv_left & (iMullionStyle_11 = MULLION_SOLID_PANEL)) | \ (gs_sidelight_right & gs_bSidelight_fr_hdiv_right & (iMullionStyle_07 = MULLION_SOLID_PANEL)) | \ (gs_sidelight_left & gs_door_transom & (gs_SidelightTransomRelation_m = 3) & (iMullionStyle_10 = MULLION_SOLID_PANEL)) | \ (gs_sidelight_right & gs_door_transom & (gs_SidelightTransomRelation_m = 3) & (iMullionStyle_06 = MULLION_SOLID_PANEL)) then
bShowSolidPanelSurfaces = 1 endif
if not(bArchedTop & not(gs_sidelight_left | gs_sidelight_right)) then if (gs_sidelight_left & (iMullionStyle_09 = MULLION_VENT_PANEL)) | \ (gs_sidelight_right & (iMullionStyle_05 = MULLION_VENT_PANEL)) | \ (gs_door_transom & (iMullionStyle_02 = MULLION_VENT_PANEL)) | \ (gs_sidelight_left & gs_bSidelight_fr_hdiv_left & (iMullionStyle_11 = MULLION_VENT_PANEL)) | \ (gs_sidelight_right & gs_bSidelight_fr_hdiv_right & (iMullionStyle_07 = MULLION_VENT_PANEL)) | \ (gs_sidelight_left & gs_door_transom & (gs_SidelightTransomRelation_m = 3) & (iMullionStyle_10 = MULLION_VENT_PANEL)) | \ (gs_sidelight_right & gs_door_transom & (gs_SidelightTransomRelation_m = 3) & (iMullionStyle_06 = MULLION_VENT_PANEL)) then
bShowLouversSurfaces = 1 endif endif endif else if bMetalDoor | bEntranceDoor then bShowMullionsSurfaces = 0
if bMetalDoor then bShowLeafSurface3 = 0 else bShowLeafSurface2 = 0 bShowLeafSurface3 = 0
if iDoorPanelType = 36 | iDoorPanelType = 37 then bShowLockSurface = 1 endif endif else if _bGarageDoor then bShowFrameSurfaces = 1 else bShowFrameSurfaces = 0 endif endif endif bShowFrame3DPen = bShowFrameSurfaces
! ================================================================================ ! ListField ! ================================================================================
itemID = 1
ui_listfield listFieldDoorOpSettAttrID, 0, 0, 444, 265
ui_listitem itemID, listFieldDoorOpSettAttrID, "iDWDet3D", 0, "ui_list_detailLevel3D_flat(1)" : itemID = itemID + 1 ui_listitem itemID, listFieldDoorOpSettAttrID, "gs_shadow", 0, "ui_list_shadow_flat(1)" : itemID = itemID + 1 ui_listitem itemID, listFieldDoorOpSettAttrID, "res", 0, "ui_list_resol_flat(1)" : itemID = itemID + 1 ui_listitem itemID, listFieldDoorOpSettAttrID, "gs_SashText_typ", 0, "" : itemID = itemID + 1
! ============================================================================= ! Override MVO for 3D Projections ! ============================================================================= itemID = 10
ui_listitem itemID, listFieldDoorOpSettAttrID, "bOverride_MVO_3D", 0 : itemID = itemID + 1 if bOverride_MVO_3D then ui_listitem itemID, listFieldDoorOpSettAttrID, "or_bOplines3D", 1 : itemID = itemID + 1 endif
if or_bOplines3D & bOverride_MVO_3D then ui_listitem itemID, listFieldDoorOpSettAttrID, "or_opLineType3dIn", 1 : itemID = itemID + 1 ui_listitem itemID, listFieldDoorOpSettAttrID, "or_opLineType3dOut", 1 : itemID = itemID + 1 ui_listitem itemID, listFieldDoorOpSettAttrID, "or_opLineStyle", 1 : itemID = itemID + 1
ui_listitem itemID, listFieldDoorOpSettAttrID, "or_opLinePen", 1, "ui_list_contourPen_flat(1)" : itemID = itemID + 1 endif
! ================================================================================ ! Frame and Leaf Surfaces ! ================================================================================ itemID = 20
ui_listitem itemID, listFieldDoorOpSettAttrID, "", 0, "", st_uiDoorSettModAttr[1] : itemID = itemID + 1 ! Frame and Leaf Surfaces ui_listitem itemID, listFieldDoorOpSettAttrID, "bLinkSurfacesFrameSash", 1, "ui_list_surface_flat(1)" : itemID = itemID + 1
if bShowFrameSurfaces then ui_listitem itemID, listFieldDoorOpSettAttrID, "gs_frame_mat", 1, "ui_list_surface_flat(1)" : itemID = itemID + 1 ui_listitem itemID, listFieldDoorOpSettAttrID, "gs_frame_mat2", 1, "ui_list_surface_flat(1)" : itemID = itemID + 1 endif if gs_sectgar then ui_listitem itemID, listFieldDoorOpSettAttrID, "gs_track_mat", 1, "ui_list_surface_flat(1)" : itemID = itemID + 1 endif ui_listitem itemID, listFieldDoorOpSettAttrID, "gs_leaf_mat", 1, "ui_list_surface_flat(1)" : itemID = itemID + 1 ui_listitem itemID, listFieldDoorOpSettAttrID, "gs_leaf_matin", 1, "ui_list_surface_flat(1)" : itemID = itemID + 1 if bShowLeafSurface2 then ui_listitem itemID, listFieldDoorOpSettAttrID, "gs_leaf_mat2", 1, "ui_list_surface_flat(1)" : itemID = itemID + 1 endif if bShowLeafSurface3 then ui_listitem itemID, listFieldDoorOpSettAttrID, "gs_leaf_mat3", 1, "ui_list_surface_flat(1)" : itemID = itemID + 1 endif if bShowTransomSurfaces then ui_listitem itemID, listFieldDoorOpSettAttrID, "gs_transom_mat", 1, "ui_list_surface_flat(1)" : itemID = itemID + 1 ui_listitem itemID, listFieldDoorOpSettAttrID, "gs_transom_matin", 1, "ui_list_surface_flat(1)" : itemID = itemID + 1 endif if bShowSidelightSurfaces1 then ui_listitem itemID, listFieldDoorOpSettAttrID, "gs_sidelight1_mat", 1, "ui_list_surface_flat(1)" : itemID = itemID + 1 ui_listitem itemID, listFieldDoorOpSettAttrID, "gs_sidelight1_matin", 1, "ui_list_surface_flat(1)" : itemID = itemID + 1 endif if bShowSidelightSurfaces2 then ui_listitem itemID, listFieldDoorOpSettAttrID, "gs_sidelight2_mat", 1, "ui_list_surface_flat(1)" : itemID = itemID + 1 ui_listitem itemID, listFieldDoorOpSettAttrID, "gs_sidelight2_matin", 1, "ui_list_surface_flat(1)" : itemID = itemID + 1 endif if bShowBottomPartSurface then ui_listitem itemID, listFieldDoorOpSettAttrID, "gs_bottom_part_mat", 1, "ui_list_surface_flat(1)" : itemID = itemID + 1 endif if bShowMullionsSurfaces then if iDoorPanelType = 47 | iDoorPanelType = 48 | iDoorPanelType = 45 then ui_listitem itemID, listFieldDoorOpSettAttrID, "gs_leaf_grill_mat", 1, "ui_list_surface_flat(1)" : itemID = itemID + 1 ui_listitem itemID, listFieldDoorOpSettAttrID, "gs_leaf_grill_mat2", 1, "ui_list_surface_flat(1)" : itemID = itemID + 1 else ui_listitem itemID, listFieldDoorOpSettAttrID, "gs_grill_mat", 1, "ui_list_surface_flat(1)" : itemID = itemID + 1 ui_listitem itemID, listFieldDoorOpSettAttrID, "gs_grill_mat2", 1, "ui_list_surface_flat(1)" : itemID = itemID + 1 endif endif if bShowSolidPanelSurfaces then ui_listitem itemID, listFieldDoorOpSettAttrID, "gs_panel_mat", 1, "ui_list_surface_flat(1)" : itemID = itemID + 1 ui_listitem itemID, listFieldDoorOpSettAttrID, "gs_panel_mat2", 1, "ui_list_surface_flat(1)" : itemID = itemID + 1 endif if bShowLouversSurfaces then ui_listitem itemID, listFieldDoorOpSettAttrID, "gs_ventSashLouver_mat", 1, "ui_list_surface_flat(1)" : itemID = itemID + 1 endif if bShowGlassSurface then if _bGarageDoor then ui_listitem itemID, listFieldDoorOpSettAttrID, "gs_glass_mat", 1, "ui_list_surface_flat(1)" : itemID = itemID + 1 else ui_listitem itemID, listFieldDoorOpSettAttrID, "gs_leaf_glass_mat", 1, "ui_list_surface_flat(1)" : itemID = itemID + 1 endif endif
! ================================================================================ ! Handle Surfaces ! ================================================================================ itemID = 60
if bShowHandleSurface | \ bShowHandleAccSurface | \ bShowLockSurface then ui_listitem itemID, listFieldDoorOpSettAttrID, "", 0, "", st_uiDoorSettModAttr[2] : itemID = itemID + 1 ! Handle Surfaces if bShowHandleSurface then ui_listitem itemID, listFieldDoorOpSettAttrID, "gs_handle_mat", 1, "ui_list_surface_flat(1)" : itemID = itemID + 1 endif if bShowHandleAccSurface then ui_listitem itemID, listFieldDoorOpSettAttrID, "gs_handle_ac_mat", 1, "ui_list_surface_flat(1)" : itemID = itemID + 1 endif if bShowLockSurface then ui_listitem itemID, listFieldDoorOpSettAttrID, "gs_lock_mat", 1, "ui_list_surface_flat(1)" : itemID = itemID + 1 endif endif
! ================================================================================ ! Kick Board Surface ! ================================================================================ itemID = 70
if bShowKickBoard then ui_listitem itemID, listFieldDoorOpSettAttrID, "", 0, "", st_uiDoorSettModAttr[3] : itemID = itemID + 1 ! Handle Surfaces ui_listitem itemID, listFieldDoorOpSettAttrID, "matKickBoardOut", 1, "ui_list_surface_flat(1)" : itemID = itemID + 1 ui_listitem itemID, listFieldDoorOpSettAttrID, "matKickBoardIn", 1, "ui_list_surface_flat(1)" : itemID = itemID + 1 endif
! ================================================================================ ! Frame and Leaf 3D Pens ! ================================================================================ itemID = 80
ui_listitem itemID, listFieldDoorOpSettAttrID, "", 0, "", st_uiDoorSettModAttr[4] : itemID = itemID + 1 ! Frame and Leaf 3D Pens if bShowFrame3DPen then ui_listitem itemID, listFieldDoorOpSettAttrID, "gs_frame_pen", 1, "ui_list_pencolor_flat(1)" : itemID = itemID + 1 endif ui_listitem itemID, listFieldDoorOpSettAttrID, "gs_leaf_pen", 1, "ui_list_pencolor_flat(1)" : itemID = itemID + 1 if bShowGlass3DPen then if _bGarageDoor then ui_listitem itemID, listFieldDoorOpSettAttrID, "gs_glass_pen", 1, "ui_list_pencolor_flat(1)" : itemID = itemID + 1 else ui_listitem itemID, listFieldDoorOpSettAttrID, "gs_leaf_glass_pen", 1, "ui_list_pencolor_flat(1)" : itemID = itemID + 1 endif endif
! ================================================================================ ! Ventilation Profile ! ================================================================================ itemID = 100
if bVentilationProfile then ui_listitem itemID, listFieldDoorOpSettAttrID, "", 0, "", st_uiDoorSettModAttr[5] : itemID = itemID + 1 ! Ventilation Profile ui_listitem itemID, listFieldDoorOpSettAttrID, "gs_ventProfile_mat", 1, "ui_list_surface_flat(1)" : itemID = itemID + 1 endif

Boolean.Name: AC_HoleMaterialCurved
Boolean.Description: "Hole Surface's Split is Curved in Curved Walls"
